## About Jose Cano is a software engineer with more than 5 years of experience in web development (full stack) as well as PC and Mobile development. Proud geek 🤓 technology enthusiast and coding maniac. Loves challenges and beautiful code. Born in 🇪🇸 but citizen of the world 🌍, living currently in Holland, where he works in an R&D department.
